name: Connect Four 3D
description:
Connect Four is fun but not as much in 2D than in 3D!

Connect Four 3D is a fun and challenging game to play alone or with your friends and family!
It is all about getting four of your colored game stones in a row to win!
Build traps for your opponent, outsmart him and be the first to get four in a row!

There are 3 levels of difficulty against the computer: easy, normal and hard,
and also a multiplayer mode to play against a friend on the same device.
